categories: Category:Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures episodes

nodes.text: Luke Skywalker vs. Darth Vader – Join Me
"Luke Skywalker vs. Darth Vader – Join Me" is the twelfth episode of Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures. It premiered on the StarWarsKids.com and Disney Now websites on January 18, 2019.

At the Cloud City carbon-freeze chamber, Darth Vader confronts Luke Skywalker. Vader tells Skywalker that his destiny lies with him but Luke disagrees. Using the Force, Darth Vader hurls objects at Skywalker, which Luke dodges. The two cross blades and clash in the chamber.

Skywalker manages to push Vader down into one of the maintenance hatches. Downstairs, the two continue the duel with Vader ambushing Skywalker and using the Force to hurl objects at him. Skywalker is thrown out the window and manages to hang on to a bridge. Vader continues the pursuit and Skywalker is forced to dodge him.

Lord Vader maneuvers Skywalker towards the edge of the platform. Darth Vader invites Skywalker to join him, tempting him with the power of the dark side. Skywalker says he will never join him and charges at Lord Vader. There is a bright glow of light and the screen fades out.
